overview: From the infamous Gregory Dark! Welcome to the other side of reality. Revolutionary pleasure control technology promises to deliver our hero, William X, to a deeper level of paradise replete with a nympho-maniacal servant girls. Eager to begin preparations for the rigors of a mind-boggling sacrificial gang-bang, William X's perverse obsessions for anal defilement short-circuits the mechanism, causing him to by trapped in a velvet underground of hedonistic delusions. Take a ride on the dark side of insane, exquisite perversity!
title: The Psycho Sexuals
